title: Deadly Sphere Staff
summaries: The Deadly Sphere Staff is a Hardmode, post-Plantera summoning weapon that summons a Deadly Sphere minion. The Deadly Sphere minion passively levitates around the player and attacks enemies by charging into them at high velocity. Once every three attacks, it briefly stops in place to cycle through one of four visual forms before continuing to attack its chosen target. The Deadly Sphere's forms are circulated in a predetermined order and are entirely cosmetic. It cannot move through blocks. Like other minions, the summoned Deadly Sphere is invincible and follows the player for an unlimited amount of time, unless the player dies, summons a replacement minion, cancels the buff, or leaves the world. The Deadly Sphere Staff has a 1/30 (3.33%) / 59/900 (6.56%) chance to drop from Deadly Spheres during the Solar Eclipse event.

Its best modifier is Ruthless. The Mythical modifier provides the widest array of stat bonuses, but these primarily affect the initial summon rather than the resulting minion. Additionally, minions cannot deal critical hits. The only lasting advantage a Mythical Deadly Sphere Staff has over a Ruthless one is knockback.
